SettingsPanel.Title: SETTINGS
SettingsPanel.Body: This is a beautiful settings panel you can use to, among other things, change the language. Click the flags to change language.#EOL##EOL#If you have a look at one of the textfields, you can see that they have a component on them for automatically fetching language data.
Facts: There are over 300 languages spoken in England.
Gargoyles were originally used as drain pipes!
England is thought of as having the world’s worst food.
